subject: Child Abuse and Neglect
Football (College)
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
Sex Crimes
lead_paragraph: In an investigation, Louis J. Freeh found a coach bending his bosses to his will, a staff mostly unaware of its duties to report abuse, and a university president who hid problems.
snippet: In an investigation, Louis J. Freeh found a coach bending his bosses to his will, a staff mostly unaware of its duties to report abuse, and a university president who hid problems.
